description: This curry is creamy, aromatic and packed full of eastern flavours.
keywords: Tikka masala,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Turkey Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large pot to a medium heat with the canola oil and fry the onion, garlic and mushrooms for 5 minutes. Add the capsicum to the pan with the spices and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Add the passata and coconut milk. Chop the cooked turkey and add that to the pot also and allow everything to simmer for 15 minutes. Serve with a choice of condiments.
